yes: How can I help you survivor?
Seen any interesting specimens?  I mean dinosaurs.
I was just imagining you transforming into a tyrannosaurus rex.  Of course that's impossible.  Unless…
dynamic_line.no: Please leave me be, I am but a humble muck farmer in this humble muck.

responses.text: You are dressed like a scientist.  Are you a scientist?  You look like a dinosaur.  Are you a dinosaur?  Are you a scientist dinosaur?
You look like you need help.  Can I do something for you?

dynamic_line: You have seen through my ruse.  In retrospect I should have prepared a costume of some kind.  Unimportant!  You haven't attacked me or tried to seduce me so you aren't like the others.  Had any bad headaches recently, strange mood swings, strong urges, desire for human flesh?

responses.text: Only the usual.  What are you really?
You are aware of the Cataclysm then?
I'd rather not say at this point.

dynamic_line: I am a hard working professional in a challenging field adjusting to a recent change in circumstances.  That is all you need to know.

My manager Dr. Tingle made some important mistakes and I have had to make some quick decisions I would rather not go into detail on.  In retrospect our faculties may have been influenced by external factors.  Suffice to say Dr. Tingle is no longer with us but died happy.  And I escaped alive.
Look at me.  Yes, I am aware.  The question is what happens next.

responses.text: Yes.  Let's talk about something else.

dynamic_line: I just got here actually, I've found it wise to move a lot recently.  There may be some interesting specimens nearby.  I mean dinosaurs.

dialogue.describe: I think I might know where a decent chemistry set is…
dialogue.offer: I need a full chemistry set to do my work properly.  I could use some help.
dialogue.rejected: Fine, you'll probably be dead soon anyway.
dialogue.advice: It might be too dangerous now, any working full chemistry set is fine.  There is a good chance something got out.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the set yet?
dialogue.success_lie: Very convincing.  I do need an actual chemistry set to work though.
dialogue.failure: It's fine, I'll make something work.

dialogue.offer: I don't have access to standard lab procedures here.  Find Dr. Kiernan and get some notes on the basics.  I can work from there.
dialogue.advice: Kiernan is probably still at the old field office.  It should be fine as long as the emergency power is still working.  You may have to do some kind of stupid task before Kiernan talks.  Try not to get violent.  If Kiernan is dead try and find some notes or books.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the information yet?
dialogue.success: Let's get started.  Oh, I'll make you a copy just in case.
dialogue.success_lie: Very convincing.  I do need the information to work though.
dialogue.failure: It's fine, I'll make something work.
